title: The Perf Sprint for Web
description: The Perf Sprint for Web is an event for top developers from all over the world who are building amazing experiences on the web but often struggle with performance and want to optimize things.

The sessions hosted in this event will be helpful to technology enthusiasts from from Junior Developers to Senior Technical Architect. The sessions will be on multiple aspects of modern web development through the journeys of experienced developers from the community. This exclusive content will cover tips, tricks, tools and engines that can help improve your process, and performance of your applications while making you more productive!
Do not miss the opportunity to interact with various community leaders from the Angular, React, Vue, and Svelte community, as they join us to share their wisdom about performance optimizations.
If you are aware of who in your team would benefit from this content, please share this link with your team member so that they can register!

schedule.title: Welcome
schedule.description: We’ll kick things off by sharing why we are coming together as a community and cover some of the key updates made to the platform around performance, security and privacy, as well as a look at building tools and rich content.
